mapper.select: SELECT (boardId, title, user_id, createDate, viewCount, likeCount) FROM board;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_id, title, content, createDate, updateDate, likeCount, dislikeCount, viewCount) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{likeCount}, #{dislikeCount}, #{viewCount})
